setup row ws kfbf k1 4 sts setup row rs sl1 wyif move black tail to back and join red yarn k to last st of stripe k2tog working row 1 rs sl1 wyif k to last st sl1 wyif the two different colored sts decrease twice k to last st row 2 ws kfb k to last 2 sts kfb k1 2 sts sl1 wyif 2 sts decreased increased repeat row 1 2 until st count is same as first stripe row 1 ws k2tog k to 1 st before middle st cdd k to last 2 sts ssk 4 sts decreased next row rs sl1 wyif k to last st sl1 wyif row 2 rs sl1 wyif k to last st sl1 wyif next row ws k1 k2tog k to last 2 sts kfb k1 repeat row 1 2 until you have 3 sts remaining after the final ws row there were zero sts worked stripe between decreases row 1 rs sl1 wyif k to last st sl1 wyif p1 into first final rs row cdd 1 st top selvage st of previous stripe then psso row 2 ws sl1 knitwise wyib k2tog k to last 2 sts finishing kfb k1 break final yarn and pull through repeat row 1 2 purling into next selvage sts until weave in all remaining ends using the tails along last p1 was into last selvage st completing the the right edge to clean up the joins between stripes following row 2 along that side as much as you like break yarn but do not move sts onto
